name: Joan of Arc
what_did:
Joan of Arc said she heard voices from God telling her to help France.
She led French troops to victory in an important battle during the Hundred Years’ War.
She was captured and sadly burned at the stake.
why_matters:
Joan of Arc is a symbol of bravery and faith.
She showed that even a young woman could lead armies and change history.
She was later made a saint in the Catholic Church.
